programme.title: Al Ittihad Club (KSA) vs Shabab Al Ahli (UAE) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - West MD2 [Football]
programme.desc: This will be the first meeting between Al-Ittihad and Shabab Al Ahli in AFC Champions League Elite history; teams from Saudi Arabia have won seven of their last eight games in the competition against teams from UAE, however, the one loss in this run was Al-Ittihad’s 1-2 loss to Al Wahda in their opening matchday of the 2025-26 season. Al-Ittihad have lost each of their last three AFC Champions League Elite games, their joint-longest run of such games in the competition, including a 1-2 loss to Al Wahda on Matchday 1; Al-Ittihad have never lost each of their first two games of an AFC Champions League Elite campaign and only twice have they failed to win any of their first two games.

programme.title: Newcastle United vs. Arsenal - English Premier League 2025/2026 [Football]
programme.desc: Newcastle United have won each of their last three home games against Arsenal in all competitions without conceding a single goal, while they last won four in a row at home to the Gunners in August 1969. Under Mikel Arteta, Arsenal have only lost more away games at Manchester City in all competitions than they have away to Newcastle United.

programme.title: Nice vs Paris FC - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 6 [Football]
programme.desc: The record is even between Nice and Paris FC in Ligue 1, with three wins apiece. OGCN have won all three of their home games against PFC in the top-flight, having only hosted CO Roubaix more often while boasting a 100% success rate. Nice have conceded nine goals in their first five Ligue 1 2025/26 matches, their highest tally at this stage of a season since 2014/15.

programme.title: Johor Darul Ta’zim FC (MAS) vs FC Machida Zelvia (JPN) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - East [Football]
programme.desc: Johor Darul Ta’zim will be playing against Machida Zelvia for the first time in AFC Champions League history; Johor Darul Ta’zim are winless in their last seven games in the competition against teams from Japan, failing to score in each of the last five of these games. Machida Zelvia are the fifth Japanese club to start their debut AFC Champions League Elite campaign with a draw ; the last two such participants gained at least one point in their second game.

programme.title: Jannik SINNER (ITA) vs Learner TIEN (USA) - China Open, Beijing - 2025 - ATP 500 - Final [Tennis]
programme.desc: Jannik Sinner vs Learner Tien. Sinner reaches his third straight Beijing final—his 30th tour-level title match and ninth in a row on hard courts. Teenager Tien, 19, is into his first ATP final after Medvedev retired in the semis. First meeting between the pair. Fast hard court favors Sinner’s first-strike baseline power; Tien counters with speed and resilience. 500 ranking points and the Beijing crown at stake.

programme.desc: Kairat’s game against Real Madrid will be the just the second fixture played between sides from Kazakhstan and Spain in the European Cup/UEFA Champions League, after Astana’s meetings with Atlético Madrid in the 2015-16 group stage. Real Madrid have only lost three of the last 30 instances when facing a team for the first time in the European Cup/UEFA Champions League, suffering defeats against Lille in 2024, Sheriff Tiraspol in 2021 and Wolfsburg in 2016.

programme.title: Crystal Palace vs. Liverpool - English Premier League 2025/2026 [Football]
programme.desc: Crystal Palace have won just one of their last 16 Premier League meetings with Liverpool, winning 1-0 at Anfield in April 2024. The Eagles haven’t scored more than once in any of their last 12 league games against the Reds. Liverpool have won nine and lost none of their last 10 away league games against Crystal Palace – this is their longest ongoing unbeaten run away from home in the league against any side.

programme.title: Leeds United vs AFC Bournemouth - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6 [Football]
programme.desc: Leeds United have won all seven of their home league games against Bournemouth, scoring 18 goals in the process; it’s the most they’ve faced a side on home soil with a 100% win rate in their league history. The last league match between Leeds United and Bournemouth saw the Cherries win 4-1 in April 2023 in what was Javi Gracia’s final game in charge of the Whites. Bournemouth have never won back-to-back league meetings with the Yorkshire club.

programme.title: Getafe vs Levante - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 7 [Football]
programme.desc: Getafe have won their last three LaLiga home games against Levante, their best run of consecutive home wins against the Granota side in their entire history in the top-flight. Levante have won four of their 14 LaLiga away games against Getafe, and against no other opponent have they recorded more away wins in the history of the competition.

programme.title: FK Bodø/Glimt vs Tottenham Hotspur - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2 [Football]
programme.desc: The only previous meetings between Bodø/Glimt and Tottenham came in May of this year, with the English side winning home and away in the UEFA Europa League semi-finals, before going on to lift the trophy. Bodø/Glimt have lost 100% of their games against English sides in major European competition ; their worst losing record against sides from a single nation. All of those defeats have come in the UEFA Europa League since the 2022-23 campaign.

programme.title: GP Confidential 2025 Magazine
programme.desc: Explore the sporting secrets of F1. Across 25 episodes and in crisp 3D animations, we analyses the technical details, which decide which teams make the most of the rules - and which need to go back to the drawing board. Complemented by features on historical milestones as well as race previews - GP Confidential is the perfect treat for any F1 fan.

programme.title: Galatasaray vs Liverpool - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2 [Football]
programme.desc: Galatasaray and Liverpool will meet for a fifth time in European competition, with both sides managing one victory apiece across the previous four. This will be their first game against each other since a 3-2 win for Galatasaray in the UEFA Champions League in December 2006. Liverpool are winless in their previous two away trips to face Galatasaray, 1-1 in February 2002 and losing 3-2 in December 2006. The only teams they’ve faced away from home more often in the European Cup/UEFA Champions League without winning are Chelsea and Napoli.

programme.title: Al Sadd vs Al Duhail - Qatar Stars League 2025/26 - W6 [Football]
programme.desc: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. The most famous participating clubs are Al-Sadd, the champions of the last season; Al-Rayyan and Al-Arabi, the popular teams, Al-Duhail and Al-Gharafa, serious contenders for the title every season. The Qatari league includes star names such as Firmino, Verratti, and Qatari Akram Afif, the best player in Asia.

programme.title: Internazionale Milano vs Slavia Praha - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2 [Football]
programme.desc: This will be the third meeting between Internazionale and Slavia Prague in European competition, with the previous two also coming in the UEFA Champions League in the 2019-20 group stage – Inter drew 1-1 at home, before winning 3-1 in the reverse fixture on the road. Slavia Prague have never won away to an Italian side in major European competition, losing seven of their eight attempts to date. The one game they did manage to avoid defeat in, however, came against Internazionale in September 2019.

programme.desc: This will be the first AFC Champions League Elite fixture between Vissel Kobe and Melbourne City; City are without a win in any of their three Champions League Elite games against Japanese sides, while Kobe have won their only previous game against an Australian opposition in the competition. programme.title: Valencia vs Real Oviedo - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 7 [Football]
programme.desc: Valencia have not lost any of their last nine matches against Real Oviedo in LaLiga – although they have drawn five of them – the longest unbeaten run against the Asturian side in their history in the top-flight. Real Oviedo have only kept a clean sheet in one of their last 36 away games against Valencia CF in LaLiga : a 1-0 win in September 1988 with Vicente Miera as manager, in what was their last away victory against them in the top-flight.

programme.title: Brentford vs. Manchester United - English Premier League 2025/2026 [Football]
programme.desc: Brentford have won two of their last three home Premier League games against Manchester United, as many as their first six home league matches versus the Red Devils beforehand. After their 4-3 defeat in May, Manchester United could lose back-to-back league meetings with Brentford for only the third time, after previously doing so in the second tier in December 1934 and top-flight in February 1937.

programme.title: Toulouse vs Nantes - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 6 [Football]
programme.desc: Toulouse-Nantes is the only fixture to have ended in two 0-0 draws in Ligue 1 last season, with the last goal in this fixture dating back to February 2024. This could be the first fixture to produce three consecutive goalless draws in the top-flight since Reims-Nice between 2020 and 2021. Toulouse have won only one of their last 10 home games against Nantes in all competitions, that was on 7 April 2019.

programme.title: Everton vs West Ham United - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6 [Football]
programme.desc: Everton have won just one of their last five Premier League home games against West Ham, with David Moyes in either dugout for all of those games. Since the start of 2021, West Ham have only enjoyed more Premier League wins against Wolves than they have versus Everton. Both league matches between the two sides last season, however, were drawn.

programme.title: Shanghai Shenhua FC (CHN) vs Ulsan HD FC (KOR) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - East MD2 [Football]
programme.desc: Ulsan HD have won each of their three AFC Champions League Elite games against Shanghai Shenhua, scoring at least two goals in each of those games; in fact, they have won seven of their last eight such fixtures against Chinese teams, with their only defeat in that period being a 1-3 loss to Shanghai Port on 26 November 2024. Shanghai Shenhua have failed to score two or more goals in each of their last three AFC Champions League Elite fixtures, the last time they went on a longer such run was a stretch of six games between April 2009 and April 2011.

programme.title: Newcastle United vs. Arsenal - English Premier League 2025/2026 [Football]
programme.desc: Newcastle United have won each of their last three home games against Arsenal in all competitions without conceding a single goal, while they last won four in a row at home to the Gunners in August 1969. programme.desc: Barcelona have lost two of their last five matches against Real Sociedad in LaLiga, twice as many defeats as in their previous 16 encounters with the San Sebastian side in the top-flight. programme.title: Qatar Club vs Al Shamal - Qatar Stars League 2025/26 - W6 [Football]
programme.desc: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. The most famous participating clubs are Al-Sadd, the champions of the last season; Al-Rayyan and Al-Arabi, the popular teams, Al-Duhail and Al-Gharafa, serious contenders for the title every season. The Qatari league includes star names such as Firmino, Verratti, and Qatari Akram Afif, the best player in Asia.

programme.title: Union Saint-Gilloise vs Newcastle United - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2 [Football]
programme.desc: Union Saint-Gilloise will face off against an English side for the fifth time in European competition. After losing their first three, they beat Liverpool 2-1 at home in the most recent one in December 2023. Since losing their first game against a Belgian side in March 1970, Newcastle are unbeaten in their last nine such matches in European competition, winning eight of them. The most recent of those, however, came in a 2-2 draw against Club Brugge in November 2012 in the UEFA Europa League.

programme.title: Qarabağ FK vs Copenhagen - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2 [Football]
programme.desc: Qarabag and Copenhagen have faced each other on four previous occasions, with all four of those coming in qualifying matches. Copenhagen progressed from the first of those ties, before Qarabag progressed from the most recent. In 1998-99, Copenhagen won 10-0 over two legs against Qarabag in qualifying for the Cup Winners' Cup. Including qualifiers, this remains the Azerbaijani side’s heaviest ever defeat over two legs against a European side.

programme.title: Barcelona vs Paris Saint-Germain - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2 [Football]
programme.desc: Barcelona and Paris SG will meet for the 16th time in European competition, with the two sides separated by just one victory across the previous 15. Since winning three consecutive UEFA Champions League games against Paris SG in the 2014-15 season – all of which were with Luis Enrique in charge – Barcelona have only won two of their last six meetings with the French side in the competition.

programme.title: History of the Asian Games
programme.desc: From its beginnings to today, the Asian Games torch lighting has become a dazzling showcase of creativity and technology. Each edition brings fresh innovation, with Doha 2006’s unforgettable horse-and-rider moment still hailed as a highlight. As the 2026 Games in Japan draw near, excitement builds over what new spectacle will capture the world’s imagination.

programme.title: Napoli vs Sporting Clube de Portugal - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2 [Football]
programme.desc: The two previous meetings between Napoli and Sporting CP have both finished 0-0, with both coming in the first round of the 1989-90 UEFA Cup first round. Napoli have won all four of their UEFA Champions League matches against Portuguese sides, beating Benfica twice in 2016-17 and Braga twice in 2023-24.

programme.desc: Sport, Football, Sport. Suivez de pres le parcours du Paris Saint-Germain avec une couverture complete des dernieres infos, des resultats et des prochains rendez-vous, alors que le club emblematique continue de marquer l'histoire de la Ligue 1 depuis 1974.

programme.title: Monaco vs Manchester City - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2 [Football]
programme.desc: The only previous competitive meetings between Monaco and Manchester City came in the last 16 of the 2016-17 UEFA Champions League, with the French side progressing on away goals following a 6-6 aggregate scoreline. Monaco are one of only two sides, along with Real Madrid in 2024-25, to eliminate a Pep Guardiola team from the UEFA Champions League prior to the quarter-finals.

programme.title: Arsenal vs Olympiacos - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2 [Football]
programme.desc: This will be the 13th time Arsenal and Olympiakos have faced each other in European competition, with none of the previous 12 ending in a stalemate and both sides winning six games apiece. Arsenal have faced Olympiakos on four occasions during Mikel Arteta’s reign as manager ; only facing PSV more often in European competition. The Greeks eliminated them from the UEFA Europa League in 2019-20, before the Gunners eliminated Olympiakos from the same competition the following season.

programme.title: Villarreal vs Juventus - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2 [Football]
programme.desc: This will be the first time Villarreal have hosted an Italian side since February 2022, which was also a UEFA Champions League game against Juventus. Dusan Vlahovic opened the scoring after just 33 seconds, but Villarreal came back to draw 1-1 in the first leg of a last 16 tie. The previous two meetings between Villarreal and Juventus came in the last 16 of the UEFA Champions League in 2021-22, with the Spaniards progressing after a 1-1 draw at home and a 3-0 win away in Turin.

programme.title: Bayer 04 Leverkusen vs PSV Eindhoven - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2 [Football]
programme.desc: Bayer Leverkusen and PSV have met twice previously in European competition, with both coming in the first round of the 1994-95 UEFA Cup. After a 5-4 home win for Leverkusen in the first leg, the second leg in the Netherlands ended 0-0. Bayer Leverkusen are unbeaten in their seven meetings with Dutch sides in European competition, with the most recent coming in the UEFA Champions League last season, in a 4-0 win over Feyenoord in the league phase.

programme.title: Borussia Dortmund vs Athletic Club - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2 [Football]
programme.desc: Borussia Dortmund and Athletic Club will face each other for the first time in European competition, while this will be Athletic’s first game against a German side in the European Cup/UEFA Champions League. Borussia Dortmund have only lost three of their 16 home games against Spanish teams in the UEFA Champions League, while only Real Madrid have managed to beat them by more than a single goal – doing so in the 2017-18 edition which they went on to win overall.

programme.title: QPR vs Oxford United - EFL - English Football League SkyBet - Championship 2025/2026 [Football]
programme.desc: Live and exclusive coverage only on beIN of the 2025–2026 EFL Championship. The EFL Championship is the second tier in the English Football league system. The season will run from 8 August 2025 until 2 May 2026.

programme.title: Brentford vs. Manchester United - English Premier League 2025/2026 [Football]
programme.desc: Brentford have won two of their last three home Premier League games against Manchester United, as many as their first six home league matches versus the Red Devils beforehand. After their 4-3 defeat in May, Manchester United could lose back-to-back league meetings with Brentford for only the third time, after previously doing so in the second tier in December 1934 and top-flight in February 1937.

programme.title: Jannik SINNER (ITA) vs Learner TIEN (USA) - China Open, Beijing - 2025 - ATP 500 - Final [Tennis]
programme.desc: Jannik Sinner vs Learner Tien. Sinner reaches his third straight Beijing final—his 30th tour-level title match and ninth in a row on hard courts. Teenager Tien, 19, is into his first ATP final after Medvedev retired in the semis. First meeting between the pair. Fast hard court favors Sinner’s first-strike baseline power; Tien counters with speed and resilience. 500 ranking points and the Beijing crown at stake.

programme.desc: Barcelona have lost two of their last five matches against Real Sociedad in LaLiga, twice as many defeats as in their previous 16 encounters with the San Sebastian side in the top-flight. programme.title: Shanghai Shenhua FC (CHN) vs Ulsan HD FC (KOR) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - East MD2 [Football]
programme.desc: Ulsan HD have won each of their three AFC Champions League Elite games against Shanghai Shenhua, scoring at least two goals in each of those games; in fact, they have won seven of their last eight such fixtures against Chinese teams, with their only defeat in that period being a 1-3 loss to Shanghai Port on 26 November 2024. Shanghai Shenhua have failed to score two or more goals in each of their last three AFC Champions League Elite fixtures, the last time they went on a longer such run was a stretch of six games between April 2009 and April 2011.

programme.title: Crystal Palace vs. Liverpool - English Premier League 2025/2026 [Football]
programme.desc: Crystal Palace have won just one of their last 16 Premier League meetings with Liverpool, winning 1-0 at Anfield in April 2024. The Eagles haven’t scored more than once in any of their last 12 league games against the Reds. Liverpool have won nine and lost none of their last 10 away league games against Crystal Palace – this is their longest ongoing unbeaten run away from home in the league against any side.

programme.title: Union Saint-Gilloise vs Newcastle United - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2 [Football]
programme.desc: Union Saint-Gilloise will face off against an English side for the fifth time in European competition. After losing their first three, they beat Liverpool 2-1 at home in the most recent one in December 2023. Since losing their first game against a Belgian side in March 1970, Newcastle are unbeaten in their last nine such matches in European competition, winning eight of them. The most recent of those, however, came in a 2-2 draw against Club Brugge in November 2012 in the UEFA Europa League.

programme.title: Barcelona vs Paris Saint-Germain - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2 [Football]
programme.desc: Barcelona and Paris SG will meet for the 16th time in European competition, with the two sides separated by just one victory across the previous 15. Since winning three consecutive UEFA Champions League games against Paris SG in the 2014-15 season – all of which were with Luis Enrique in charge – Barcelona have only won two of their last six meetings with the French side in the competition.

programme.title: Qarabağ FK vs Copenhagen - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2 [Football]
programme.desc: Qarabag and Copenhagen have faced each other on four previous occasions, with all four of those coming in qualifying matches. Copenhagen progressed from the first of those ties, before Qarabag progressed from the most recent. In 1998-99, Copenhagen won 10-0 over two legs against Qarabag in qualifying for the Cup Winners' Cup. Including qualifiers, this remains the Azerbaijani side’s heaviest ever defeat over two legs against a European side.

programme.title: Bayer 04 Leverkusen vs PSV Eindhoven - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2 [Football]
programme.desc: Bayer Leverkusen and PSV have met twice previously in European competition, with both coming in the first round of the 1994-95 UEFA Cup. After a 5-4 home win for Leverkusen in the first leg, the second leg in the Netherlands ended 0-0. Bayer Leverkusen are unbeaten in their seven meetings with Dutch sides in European competition, with the most recent coming in the UEFA Champions League last season, in a 4-0 win over Feyenoord in the league phase.

programme.title: Napoli vs Sporting Clube de Portugal - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2 [Football]
programme.desc: The two previous meetings between Napoli and Sporting CP have both finished 0-0, with both coming in the first round of the 1989-90 UEFA Cup first round. Napoli have won all four of their UEFA Champions League matches against Portuguese sides, beating Benfica twice in 2016-17 and Braga twice in 2023-24.

programme.title: beIN Champions - UEFA Champions League 2025/2026 [Football]
programme.desc: beIN Champions is a look through the best of the action and the unusual stories and stats and facts from the UEFA Champions League.

programme.title: La Liga Highlights 2025/2026
programme.desc: "This 55-minute program offers full 5-minute highlights of each of the games played on Friday, Saturday and Sunday.LALIGA includes special video presentations of the best goal, the best save and the best player of the day."

programme.title: Arsenal vs Olympiacos - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2 [Football]
programme.desc: This will be the 13th time Arsenal and Olympiakos have faced each other in European competition, with none of the previous 12 ending in a stalemate and both sides winning six games apiece. Arsenal have faced Olympiakos on four occasions during Mikel Arteta’s reign as manager ; only facing PSV more often in European competition. The Greeks eliminated them from the UEFA Europa League in 2019-20, before the Gunners eliminated Olympiakos from the same competition the following season.

programme.title: Brentford vs. Manchester United - English Premier League 2025/2026 [Football]
programme.desc: Brentford have won two of their last three home Premier League games against Manchester United, as many as their first six home league matches versus the Red Devils beforehand. After their 4-3 defeat in May, Manchester United could lose back-to-back league meetings with Brentford for only the third time, after previously doing so in the second tier in December 1934 and top-flight in February 1937.

programme.title: Qatar Club vs Al Shamal - Qatar Stars League 2025/26 - W6 [Football]
programme.desc: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. The most famous participating clubs are Al-Sadd, the champions of the last season; Al-Rayyan and Al-Arabi, the popular teams, Al-Duhail and Al-Gharafa, serious contenders for the title every season. The Qatari league includes star names such as Firmino, Verratti, and Qatari Akram Afif, the best player in Asia.

programme.title: Atlético de Madrid vs Eintracht Frankfurt - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2 [Football]
programme.desc: This will be the third meeting between Atlético Madrid and Eintracht Frankfurt in European competition, with the previous two coming in the last 16 of the 1975-76 Cup Winners’ Cup, and both won by the German side. The last German side to win away to Atlético Madrid in major European competition was Borussia Dortmund in October 1996. Since then, Atlético are unbeaten in 14 such matches, winning 10 of them.

programme.title: PSG vs Auxerre - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 6 [Football]
programme.desc: Paris SG are the team Auxerre has played and lost against most often in Ligue 1. AJA have lost 10 of their 14 away matches against PSG in the top-flight in the 21st century. Despite having the same number of points and goal difference as Monaco, Paris SG is currently second in Ligue 1 2025/26. This is only the fourth time in the last 11 seasons that PSG are not in the lead after five matches played, after 2016/17, 2020/21 and 2023/24.

programme.title: My Faith in Sport
programme.desc: Ramadan is a crucial period in the Islamic calendar but fasting (Sawm) can provide complications for athletes who are trying to compete at the highest level. But to what extent is fasting a negative or can it actually aid performance? We look at the life and adaptation throughout Ramadan of Adam Azim – an unbeaten professional boxer from the UK, Fares El Bakh – a weightlifter who won Qatar’s first ever Olympic gold medal, and Zainab Alema – a rugby player who is aiming to become the first player to represent England wearing a hijab.Experts in Sports Science and Nutrition from Aspetar Clinic, Qatar also add detail of the physical impact athletes encounter during Ramadan

programme.title: Jannik SINNER (ITA) vs Learner TIEN (USA) - China Open, Beijing - 2025 - ATP 500 - Final [Tennis]
programme.desc: Jannik Sinner vs Learner Tien. Sinner reaches his third straight Beijing final—his 30th tour-level title match and ninth in a row on hard courts. Fast hard court favors Sinner’s first-strike baseline power; Tien counters with speed and resilience. 500 ranking points and the Beijing crown at stake.

programme.title: Jannik SINNER (ITA) vs Learner TIEN (USA) - China Open, Beijing - 2025 - ATP 500 - Final [Tennis]
programme.desc: Jannik Sinner vs Learner Tien. Sinner reaches his third straight Beijing final—his 30th tour-level title match and ninth in a row on hard courts. Teenager Tien, 19, is into his first ATP final after Medvedev retired in the semis. First meeting between the pair. Fast hard court favors Sinner’s first-strike baseline power; Tien counters with speed and resilience. 500 ranking points and the Beijing crown at stake.

programme.title: Internazionale Milano vs Slavia Praha - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2 [Football]
programme.desc: This will be the third meeting between Internazionale and Slavia Prague in European competition, with the previous two also coming in the UEFA Champions League in the 2019-20 group stage – Inter drew 1-1 at home, before winning 3-1 in the reverse fixture on the road. Slavia Prague have never won away to an Italian side in major European competition, losing seven of their eight attempts to date. The one game they did manage to avoid defeat in, however, came against Internazionale in September 2019.

programme.title: Union Saint-Gilloise vs Newcastle United - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2 [Football]
programme.desc: Union Saint-Gilloise will face off against an English side for the fifth time in European competition. After losing their first three, they beat Liverpool 2-1 at home in the most recent one in December 2023. Since losing their first game against a Belgian side in March 1970, Newcastle are unbeaten in their last nine such matches in European competition, winning eight of them. The most recent of those, however, came in a 2-2 draw against Club Brugge in November 2012 in the UEFA Europa League.

programme.title: Main Race - F1 Azerbaijan Grand Prix - 2025

programme.title: Barcelona vs Paris Saint-Germain - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2 [Football]
programme.desc: Barcelona and Paris SG will meet for the 16th time in European competition, with the two sides separated by just one victory across the previous 15. Since winning three consecutive UEFA Champions League games against Paris SG in the 2014-15 season – all of which were with Luis Enrique in charge – Barcelona have only won two of their last six meetings with the French side in the competition.

programme.title: Al Sailiya vs Al Arabi - Qatar Stars League 2025/26 - W6 [Football]
programme.desc: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. The most famous participating clubs are Al-Sadd, the champions of the last season; Al-Rayyan and Al-Arabi, the popular teams, Al-Duhail and Al-Gharafa, serious contenders for the title every season. The Qatari league includes star names such as Firmino, Verratti, and Qatari Akram Afif, the best player in Asia.

programme.title: Bayer 04 Leverkusen vs PSV Eindhoven - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2 [Football]
programme.desc: Bayer Leverkusen and PSV have met twice previously in European competition, with both coming in the first round of the 1994-95 UEFA Cup. After a 5-4 home win for Leverkusen in the first leg, the second leg in the Netherlands ended 0-0. Bayer Leverkusen are unbeaten in their seven meetings with Dutch sides in European competition, with the most recent coming in the UEFA Champions League last season, in a 4-0 win over Feyenoord in the league phase.

programme.title: Napoli vs Sporting Clube de Portugal - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2 [Football]
programme.desc: The two previous meetings between Napoli and Sporting CP have both finished 0-0, with both coming in the first round of the 1989-90 UEFA Cup first round. Napoli have won all four of their UEFA Champions League matches against Portuguese sides, beating Benfica twice in 2016-17 and Braga twice in 2023-24.

programme.title: Qarabağ FK vs Copenhagen - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2 [Football]
programme.desc: Qarabag and Copenhagen have faced each other on four previous occasions, with all four of those coming in qualifying matches. Copenhagen progressed from the first of those ties, before Qarabag progressed from the most recent. In 1998-99, Copenhagen won 10-0 over two legs against Qarabag in qualifying for the Cup Winners' Cup. Including qualifiers, this remains the Azerbaijani side’s heaviest ever defeat over two legs against a European side.

programme.title: Manchester City vs Burnley - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6 - Mini Match [Football]
programme.desc: Manchester City have won each of their last 13 meetings with Burnley in all competitions by an aggregate score of 46-2. Only against West Brom, Bournemouth, Watford, and Fulham have the Citizens ever enjoyed a longer winning run in their history. Burnley are winless in their last 19 league visits to Manchester City since a 5-2 win in March 1963. The Clarets have lost each of their last seven Premier League games at the Etihad Stadium.

programme.title: Union Saint-Gilloise vs Newcastle United - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2 [Football]
programme.desc: Union Saint-Gilloise will face off against an English side for the fifth time in European competition. After losing their first three, they beat Liverpool 2-1 at home in the most recent one in December 2023. Since losing their first game against a Belgian side in March 1970, Newcastle are unbeaten in their last nine such matches in European competition, winning eight of them. The most recent of those, however, came in a 2-2 draw against Club Brugge in November 2012 in the UEFA Europa League.

programme.title: Qarabağ FK vs Copenhagen - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2 [Football]
programme.desc: Qarabag and Copenhagen have faced each other on four previous occasions, with all four of those coming in qualifying matches. Copenhagen progressed from the first of those ties, before Qarabag progressed from the most recent. In 1998-99, Copenhagen won 10-0 over two legs against Qarabag in qualifying for the Cup Winners' Cup. Including qualifiers, this remains the Azerbaijani side’s heaviest ever defeat over two legs against a European side.

programme.title: Monaco vs Manchester City - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2 [Football]
programme.desc: The only previous competitive meetings between Monaco and Manchester City came in the last 16 of the 2016-17 UEFA Champions League, with the French side progressing on away goals following a 6-6 aggregate scoreline. Monaco are one of only two sides, along with Real Madrid in 2024-25, to eliminate a Pep Guardiola team from the UEFA Champions League prior to the quarter-finals.

programme.title: M5 - Rolex Shanghai Masters ATP 1000 [Tennis]
programme.desc: Asia’s showpiece Masters returns to the Qizhong Tennis Center. Fast hard courts, night sessions, and a deep field. With 1,000 ranking points for the champion, first-strike tennis, tie-breaks, and upset runs are in play all week.

programme.title: Race 1 - Formula 4 Italy - Barcelona Round - 2025
programme.desc: Opening sprint where grid spot helps, but nerve at Turn 1 and tidy lines through T3/T9 decide early gains. In big fields, Safety Cars are common—composure on restarts and strong exits to the main straight are essential. Clean laps, minimal penalties and measured aggression convert pace into first-day silverware.

programme.desc: The 2025–26 UEFA Europa League is the secondary club football tournament organised by UEFA. The final will be played on 20 May 2026 at Beşiktaş Stadium in Istanbul, Turkey.

programme.title: Crystal Palace vs. Liverpool - English Premier League 2025/2026 [Football]
programme.desc: Crystal Palace have won just one of their last 16 Premier League meetings with Liverpool, winning 1-0 at Anfield in April 2024. The Eagles haven’t scored more than once in any of their last 12 league games against the Reds. Liverpool have won nine and lost none of their last 10 away league games against Crystal Palace – this is their longest ongoing unbeaten run away from home in the league against any side.

programme.title: Borussia Dortmund vs Athletic Club - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2 [Football]
programme.desc: Borussia Dortmund and Athletic Club will face each other for the first time in European competition, while this will be Athletic’s first game against a German side in the European Cup/UEFA Champions League. Borussia Dortmund have only lost three of their 16 home games against Spanish teams in the UEFA Champions League, while only Real Madrid have managed to beat them by more than a single goal – doing so in the 2017-18 edition which they went on to win overall.

programme.desc: beIN SPORTS MAX Channel for exclusive coverage of major sporting tournaments.

programme.title: Atlético de Madrid vs Eintracht Frankfurt - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2 [Football]
programme.desc: This will be the third meeting between Atlético Madrid and Eintracht Frankfurt in European competition, with the previous two coming in the last 16 of the 1975-76 Cup Winners’ Cup, and both won by the German side. The last German side to win away to Atlético Madrid in major European competition was Borussia Dortmund in October 1996. Since then, Atlético are unbeaten in 14 such matches, winning 10 of them.

programme.title: Atalanta vs Club Brugge KV - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2 [Football]
programme.desc: This will be the second consecutive campaign in which Atalanta and Club Brugge will face each other, with the Belgian sided winning both meetings in the 2024-25 UEFA Champions League play-off round. Atalanta only lost three of their 10 matches in the UEFA Champions League last season, while two of those three were inflicted by Club Brugge. The Italians lost more games in the play-off round than they did across eight games in the league phase.

programme.desc: Bayer Leverkusen and PSV have met twice previously in European competition, with both coming in the first round of the 1994-95 UEFA Cup. After a 5-4 home win for Leverkusen in the first leg, the second leg in the Netherlands ended 0-0. Bayer Leverkusen are unbeaten in their seven meetings with Dutch sides in European competition, with the most recent coming in the UEFA Champions League last season, in a 4-0 win over Feyenoord in the league phase.

programme.desc: This will be the third meeting between Internazionale and Slavia Prague in European competition, with the previous two also coming in the UEFA Champions League in the 2019-20 group stage – Inter drew 1-1 at home, before winning 3-1 in the reverse fixture on the road. programme.title: Crystal Palace vs. Liverpool - English Premier League 2025/2026 [Football]
programme.desc: Crystal Palace have won just one of their last 16 Premier League meetings with Liverpool, winning 1-0 at Anfield in April 2024. The Eagles haven’t scored more than once in any of their last 12 league games against the Reds. Liverpool have won nine and lost none of their last 10 away league games against Crystal Palace – this is their longest ongoing unbeaten run away from home in the league against any side.

programme.title: Al Gharafa SC (QAT) vs Al Shorta (IRQ) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - West MD2 [Football]
programme.desc: This will be the first meeting between Al Gharafa and Al Shorta in the AFC Champions League Elite; Al Gharafa is winless in their two encounters against Iraqi sides in the competition while Al Shorta is unbeaten in their last two games against Qatari sides. Al Gharafa won their most recent home game in the AFC Champions League Elite, the last time they won back-to-back home games in the competition was a run of three games between May 2012 and April 2013; they kept a clean sheet in their previous home game, they have never recorded back-to-back clean sheets at home in the competition.

programme.title: PSG vs Auxerre - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 6 [Football]
programme.desc: Paris SG are the team Auxerre has played and lost against most often in Ligue 1. AJA have lost 10 of their 14 away matches against PSG in the top-flight in the 21st century. Despite having the same number of points and goal difference as Monaco, Paris SG is currently second in Ligue 1 2025/26. This is only the fourth time in the last 11 seasons that PSG are not in the lead after five matches played, after 2016/17, 2020/21 and 2023/24.

programme.title: Qarabağ FK vs Copenhagen - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2 [Football]
programme.desc: Qarabag and Copenhagen have faced each other on four previous occasions, with all four of those coming in qualifying matches. Copenhagen progressed from the first of those ties, before Qarabag progressed from the most recent. In 1998-99, Copenhagen won 10-0 over two legs against Qarabag in qualifying for the Cup Winners' Cup. Including qualifiers, this remains the Azerbaijani side’s heaviest ever defeat over two legs against a European side.

programme.title: Internazionale Milano vs Slavia Praha - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2 [Football]
programme.desc: This will be the third meeting between Internazionale and Slavia Prague in European competition, with the previous two also coming in the UEFA Champions League in the 2019-20 group stage – Inter drew 1-1 at home, before winning 3-1 in the reverse fixture on the road. Slavia Prague have never won away to an Italian side in major European competition, losing seven of their eight attempts to date. The one game they did manage to avoid defeat in, however, came against Internazionale in September 2019.

programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

Al Duhail SC (QAT) vs Al Ahli Saudi FC (KSA) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - West MD2 - Min [Football]
programme.desc: The AFC Champions League Elite is contested by Asia's top-division football clubs. It is the most prestigious club competition in Asian football, played by the national league champions. A total of 24 clubs compete in the league stage of the competition, divided into East and West regions (12 teams each). All games are live and exclusive only on beIN

programme.title: Crystal Palace vs. Liverpool - English Premier League 2025/2026 [Football]
programme.desc: Crystal Palace have won just one of their last 16 Premier League meetings with Liverpool, winning 1-0 at Anfield in April 2024. The Eagles haven’t scored more than once in any of their last 12 league games against the Reds. Liverpool have won nine and lost none of their last 10 away league games against Crystal Palace – this is their longest ongoing unbeaten run away from home in the league against any side.

programme.title: Chengdu Rongcheng FC vs Gangwon FC (KOR) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - East MD2 [Football]
programme.desc: Chengdu Rongcheng will face Gangwon for the first time in AFC Champions League Elite; each of the last three games in the competition between teams from Korea and China have been won by the former by an exact 2-1 score, including Gangwon’s win over Shanghai Shenhua in the first round of the 2025-26 season. Gangwon beat Shanghai Shenhua 2-1 in their first ever AFC Champions League Elite game at home; the last Korean side to suffer at least one defeat in their first two games in the competition is Jeju United in 2011, while no side from Korea has suffered defeat in their first away game in the AFC Champions League Elite.

programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: My Faith in Sport
programme.desc: Ramadan is a crucial period in the Islamic calendar but fasting (Sawm) can provide complications for athletes who are trying to compete at the highest level. But to what extent is fasting a negative or can it actually aid performance? We look at the life and adaptation throughout Ramadan of Adam Azim – an unbeaten professional boxer from the UK, Fares El Bakh – a weightlifter who won Qatar’s first ever Olympic gold medal, and Zainab Alema – a rugby player who is aiming to become the first player to represent England wearing a hijab.Experts in Sports Science and Nutrition from Aspetar Clinic, Qatar also add detail of the physical impact athletes encounter during Ramadan

programme.title: Newcastle United vs Nottingham Forest - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 8 [Football]
programme.desc: Newcastle United have won six of their last seven league meetings with Nottingham Forest, including their last three in a row since a 1-3 defeat in December 2023. The Magpies last won more in succession over the Tricky Trees in March 1937. Nottingham Forest have lost eight of their last nine league visits to Newcastle United, conceding 24 goals in this period.

programme.title: History of the Asian Games
programme.desc: From its beginnings to today, the Asian Games torch lighting has become a dazzling showcase of creativity and technology. Each edition brings fresh innovation, with Doha 2006’s unforgettable horse-and-rider moment still hailed as a highlight. As the 2026 Games in Japan draw near, excitement builds over what new spectacle will capture the world’s imagination.

programme.title: Aston Villa vs Burnley - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 8 [Football]
programme.desc: Aston Villa have won both of their last two Premier League games against Burnley but haven’t won more successive league meetings with the Clarets since March 1900. Burnley’s last league visit to Aston Villa saw them lose 3-2 in December 2023; they last lost successive away league matches at Villa in April 1966.

programme.title: Al Ittihad Club (KSA) vs Shabab Al Ahli (UAE) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - West MD2 [Football]
programme.desc: This will be the first meeting between Al-Ittihad and Shabab Al Ahli in AFC Champions League Elite history; teams from Saudi Arabia have won seven of their last eight games in the competition against teams from UAE, however, the one loss in this run was Al-Ittihad’s 1-2 loss to Al Wahda in their opening matchday of the 2025-26 season. Al-Ittihad have lost each of their last three AFC Champions League Elite games, their joint-longest run of such games in the competition, including a 1-2 loss to Al Wahda on Matchday 1; Al-Ittihad have never lost each of their first two games of an AFC Champions League Elite campaign and only twice have they failed to win any of their first two games.

programme.title: Gangwon FC (KOR) vs Shanghai Shenhua FC (CHN) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - East MD1 [Football]
programme.desc: This will be the first AFC Champions League Elite meeting between Gangwon and Shanghai Shenhua, with the former set to play their first-ever game in the competition; Shenhua have lost each of their last two matches against South Korean opposition in the Champions League Elite, another defeat here will see them equal their longest such run in competition history. Shanghai Shenhua lost their most recent AFC Champions League Elite match 0-4 to Kawasaki Frontale on 12 March 2025; failure to score against Gangwon will see them go scoreless in consecutive games for the first time in the competition since May 2011.

programme.title: My Faith in Sport - Salah
programme.desc: Exploring the importance of prayer within Islam, the episode begins with an overview of our seven athletes as they introduce themselves and why Islam is so important to them. We are also introduced to Omar Sulieman, a notable Imam, who acts as narration throughout the series and a guiding voice on the key principles of Islam. The life and career of Sofyan Amrabat is explored, showcasing his role as a key part of the Fenerbahce team in Turkey and the Moroccan national side. The Atlas Lions’ run to the semi-finals of the FIFA World Cup Qatar 2022 is explored, with the impact that Salah played in the team’s belief and positivity throughout the tournament.

programme.desc: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. programme.desc: The 2025/2026 UEFA Women's Champions League is live and exclusive only on beIN. This is the first season under a new format, which have 18 participating teams, playing six games each against different opponents in a league phase, all in a joint group. programme.desc: Arsenal have lost both of their last two home league games against West Ham, only ever losing three in a row once before.
